author: Al Jazeera
title: Coronavirus in Central Asia: Virus relief funds under question
description: Donations to help those affected by the pandemic have raised concerns from some about the origin of the funds.
content:
Central Asian countries, like Kazakhstan and neighbouring Kyrgyzstan, have called on people and businesses to donate to emergency funds for the coronavirus crisis.
While the relief has been welcome, it has also given rise to questions about where the money i… [+59 chars]
